props.name: images
props.docs: List of image URLs to display in the slideshow

props.name: full
props.docs: Enable the confirm button

props.name: homeRoute
props.docs: The default or home route, when loading is successfully completed

props.name: image
props.docs: The image to display while loading

props.name: loadingTextColor
props.docs: Loading Text Color 'primary' or 'secondary' (default: 'primary')

props.name: progressBarColor
props.docs: Loading Progress Bar Color 'primary' or 'secondary' (default: 'primary')

props.name: spinnerColor
props.docs: Loading Spinner Color 'primary' or 'secondary' (default: 'primary')

props.name: defaultBackButtonHref
props.docs: Define default back button href, only used if enableBackButton is true

props.name: enableBackButton
props.docs: Enable Back Button instead of Menu Button

props.name: headerBackgroundColor
props.docs: Background color of the header toolbar, either 'primary' or 'secondary' (default: 'primary')

props.name: mapAttribution
props.docs: Map tiles attribution for the leaflet map

props.name: mapBounds
props.docs: Map bounds for the leaflet map in top left Lat/Lng, bottom right Lat/Lng

props.name: tourId
props.docs:
If tour id is given, stations only for the tour are shown.
Tour id 'default' is a placeholder for the default tour id.

props.name: defaultBackButtonHref
props.docs: Define default back button href, only used if enableBackButton is true

props.name: enableSwitchAudioOutput
props.docs:
This prop displays a button for switching audio output between speaker and earpiece.
This feature is only available on hybrid apps

props.name: stationId
props.docs: The ID of the active station to display

props.name: tourId
props.docs:
If tour id is given, stations are retrieved from specific tour.
Tour id 'default' is a placeholder for the default tour id.

props.name: validHours
props.docs: The number of hours the pin is valid for.

props.name: headerBackgroundColor
props.docs: Background color of the header toolbar, either 'primary' or 'secondary' (default: 'primary')

props.name: maxLength
props.docs: Maximum length of the input field, default to 2

props.name: tourId
props.docs:
If tour id is given, stations only for the tour are queried.
Tour id 'default' is a placeholder for the default tour id.

props.name: defaultBackButtonHref
props.docs: Define default back button href, only used if enableBackButton is true

props.name: enableBackButton
props.docs: Enable Back Button instead of Menu Button

props.name: enableSwitchAudioOutput
props.docs:
This prop displays a button for switching audio output between speaker and earpiece.
This feature is only available on hybrid apps

props.docs: The ID of the active station to display

props.name: tourId
props.docs:
If tour id is given, stations are retrieved from specific tour.
Tour id 'default' is a placeholder for the default tour id.

props.docs: Background color of the header toolbar, either 'primary' or 'secondary' (default: 'primary')

props.docs: The ID of the tour to display stations for, or null if all stations should be displayed

props.name: enableSwitchAudioOutput

This prop displays a button for switching audio output between speaker and earpiece.
This feature is only available on hybrid apps

props.docs: The ID of the initial active station to display, if set to null, the first station will be displayed

props.name: tourId
props.docs:
If tour id is given, stations are retrieved from specific tour.
Tour id 'default' is a placeholder for the default tour id.

props.name: headerBackgroundColor
props.docs: Background color of the header toolbar, either 'primary' or 'secondary' (default: 'primary')

props.name: tourId
props.docs: The ID of the tour to display stations for, or null if all stations should be displayed

props.name: headerBackgroundColor
props.docs: Background color of the header toolbar, either 'primary' or 'secondary' (default: 'primary')

props.name: collected
props.docs: Toggle collected icon

props.name: collectedPercent
props.docs: Percentage value between 0 and 100 to display status

props.name: size
props.docs: The icon size: small, normal or large.
